channel.title: Using both port 5555, and 43594
channel.description: I'm trying to run 2 different servers at once on both ports. and i have so many questions about it. 1. do i use the same ip address for both servers? 2. do i use different's ports and ip's 3. do i use the same port and different ip's?

item.title: Using both port 5555, and 43594
item.dc:creator: @Dj_Nm.E Dj Nm.E
item.description:
@Dj_Nm.E wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

To run two servers you have to use a different port, its up to you weather you want to use a different Ip address. You have to change what port the server listens for connections from and were the client connects too.

its really simple . and like he said its up 2 you. but you can have the same ip.

Read full topic
